header.subtext: Tailored services to help you grow in the region
header.title: Supply Chain Solutions

support.title: Support Services
support.subtext: A complete range of services in the Region
support.content:
We offer **Quality Assurance, Compliance & Logistics** in the main producing countries:

Mauritius
Madagascar
South Africa
Kenya & Uganda
Ethiopia 
Egypt
Tunisia
Morocco (coming soon)

virtual.title: Virtual Supplier
virtual.subtext: Complete solution accessing a network of smaller factories
virtual.content:
Complete service including sample development, merchandising, production follow-up, quality assurance & logistics support

Financing of raw materials for supplier

advisory.title: Advisory
advisory.subtext: Tap into our experience for custom advice on how to grow your regional business
advisory.content:
Strategic advice on optimal solution in the Indian Ocean 

Link with solution providers for financial advice

Specialist HR & Freelance resource database

onlinetracking.title: On-Line order tracking (coming soon...)
onlinetracking.subtext: A simple & intuitive critical-path & order-tracking functionality to improve your supply-chain visibility
onlinetracking.content:
Set up critical path date responsibilities for seller & buyer

Manage changes to CP through a simple messaging interface

Follow production progress & proactively manage variances

On-Time-In-Full report analysis 

Customised order reports

discounts.title: Corporate Discounts
discounts.subtext: Preferential prices & discounts on key services
discounts.content:
As an *ABANA PROFESSIONAL* member, take advantage of special corporate discounts on key services from partner service providers

We shall be updating our list of partners and discounts as we negotiate new deals
